thread.title: In Search of an Experienced Insurance Underwriter! at Opti Staffing (Portland, OR)
thread.title_full: In Search of an Experienced Insurance Underwriter! at Opti Staffing (Portland, OR)

title: In Search of an Experienced Insurance Underwriter! at Opti Staffing (Portland, OR)
text: Source: Opti Staffing In Search of an Experienced Insurance Underwriter! For over 80 years, this leader in MGA insurance has worked to create a high-quality product for their clients in the Pacific Northwest. Now, BUSINESS IS BOOMING and they are looking to expand their team with the addition of a new Experienced Underwriter! Requirements: Bachelor’ s degree with relative work experience +5 years of experience as an Insurance Underwriter Experience in specialty lines, Excess & Surplus lines preferred Retail experience is a MAJOR PLUS! Must have a stable employment history – No Job Hoppers! Customer service-oriented attitude Can-Do Attitude and personable demeanor – This is a small office with a NO DRAMA environment! Good work ethic REQUIRED! Creativity and ability to think “outside the box” to bring in new business and positively contribute to the bottom line Compensation: $45, 000 to $70, 000 DOE Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision (75% employer paid), 401k and Paid Vacation If you are interested in applying for this fantastic, direct hire opportunity, please email your resume to Kendra at kreed@optistaffing.com NOW to secure your interview!
